import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import ProfileTabs from "../components/profileComponents/ProfileTabs"; import Orders from "./../components/profileComponents/Orders"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getUserDetails } from "../Redux/Actions/userActions"; import moment from "moment"; const ProfileScreen = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const userInfo = userLogin; useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getUserDetails("profile")); },[dispatch]); return ( <>
j{userInfo.id}
<>Joined {moment(userInfo.createdAt).format('LL')}
{/* panels */}
); }; export default ProfileScreen;
